DOC.brief_summary: Investigate the inhibitor development rate of Human cl rhFVIII in previously untreated patients with severe Hemophilia A.
DOC.criteria: Male patients Severe Hemophilia A (FVIII:C <1%) No previous treatment with with FVIII concentrates or other blood prodcuts containing FVIII Diagnosis with a coagulation disorder other than Hemophilia A Severe liver or kidney disease Concomitant treatment with any systemic immunosuppressive drug
